description.zh-cn: 中国共产党元老宋任穷之女，文化大革命期间北京师范大学女附中红卫兵的著名领袖人物。曾因给毛泽东佩戴红卫兵袖章并被赐名“要武”而闻名全国。后移居美国成为地质学者。
description.en: Daughter of the Chinese Communist Party veteran Song Renqiong, and a prominent leader of the Red Guards at the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School during the Cultural Revolution. She became nationally famous for putting a Red Guard armband on Mao Zedong and being given the name 'Yaowu'. She later moved to the United States and became a geologist.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党元老、中国人民解放军开国上将。
description.en: A veteran of the Communist Party of China and a founding general of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 宋任穷的妻子，宋彬彬的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Song Renqiong and mother of Song Binbin.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国共产党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Then-Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一场自1966年5月至1976年10月期间的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China that lasted from May 1966 to October 1976.

zh-cn: 北京师范大学附属实验中学

description.zh-cn: 宋彬彬就读的中学，也是卞仲耘遇难的地点。
description.en: The middle school that Song Binbin attended and the location where Bian Zhongyun was killed.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期的青年学生组织。
description.en: Youth student organizations during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 北京师范大学女附中党总支书记兼副校长，在“红八月”期间被该校红卫兵批斗致死，是北京市首位在文革中被打死的教育工作者。
description.en: Party Branch Secretary and Vice Principal of the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School. She was beaten to death by Red Guards during the 'Red August,' becoming the first educator killed in Beijing during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月，文化大革命初期红卫兵运动最为暴力的阶段，期间发生大规模的批斗、抄家、暴力事件。
description.en: In August 1966, the most violent phase of the early Cultural Revolution's Red Guard movement, characterized by mass struggle sessions, home raids, and violence.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Then-Chairman of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国共产党中央书记处负责人。
description.en: Then-head of the Central Secretariat of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期由刘少奇、邓小平主导派往各单位指导运动的组织。
description.en: Organizations sent by Liu Shaoqi and Deng Xiaoping to guide the movement in various units during the early stage of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 刘仰峤之女，文化大革命期间北京师范大学女附中革命师生代表会主席。
description.en: Daughter of Liu Yangqiao, and the chair of the Revolutionary Teachers and Students Representative Council at Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共北京市委第二书记。
description.en: Then-Second Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的妻子，“四人帮”成员之一。
description.en: Wife of Mao Zedong and a member of the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 宋彬彬在1972年至1975年间作为工农兵学员就读的大学。
description.en: The university where Song Binbin studied as a Worker-Peasant-Soldier student from 1972 to 1975.

description.zh-cn: 卞仲耘的丈夫。
description.en: Husband of Bian Zhongyun.

description.zh-cn: 美国芝加哥大学学者，研究文革历史，发表文章指控宋彬彬对卞仲耘之死负有责任。
description.en: A scholar at the University of Chicago who studies the history of the Cultural Revolution and published articles holding Song Binbin responsible for the death of Bian Zhongyun.

description.zh-cn: 北京市在1928年至1949年期间的名称，宋彬彬的出生地。
description.en: The name for Beijing from 1928 to 1949, where Song Binbin was born.

description.zh-cn: 宋彬彬的逝世地点。
description.en: The place of Song Binbin's death.

description.zh-cn: 宋任穷是宋彬彬的父亲。
description.en: Song Renqiong is Song Binbin's father.

description.zh-cn: 锺月林是宋彬彬的母亲。
description.en: Zhong Yuelin is Song Binbin's mother.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命使宋彬彬成为全国闻名的红卫兵领袖。
description.en: The Cultural Revolution made Song Binbin a nationally famous Red Guard leader.

description.zh-cn: 在北京“红八月”期间，副校长卞仲耘被师大女附中的红卫兵批斗致死。
description.en: During Beijing's 'Red August', Vice Principal Bian Zhongyun was beaten to death by Red Guards from the Affiliated Girls' Middle School of Beijing Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 作为北京师范大学女附中的红卫兵领袖，宋彬彬对该校副校长卞仲耘在“红八月”期间被批斗致死的事件负有责任。她本人在2014年为此道歉。
description.en: As a leader of the Red Guards at the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School, Song Binbin bore responsibility for the death of Vice Principal Bian Zhongyun, who was beaten to death during 'Red August'. She apologized for this in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 在天安门城楼上为毛泽东佩戴红卫兵袖章，并被毛泽东建议改名为“要武”。
description.en: On the Tiananmen Rostrum, she put a Red Guard armband on Mao Zedong, who then suggested she change her name to 'Yaowu'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在天安门城楼接见宋彬彬，并为其建议名字“要武”，此举使宋彬彬闻名全国，推动了她的红卫兵领袖地位。
description.en: Mao Zedong received Song Binbin on the Tiananmen Rostrum and suggested the name 'Yaowu' for her. This act made her nationally famous and promoted her status as a Red Guard leader.

description.zh-cn: 批准成立文化大革命工作组以指导运动。
description.en: Approved the establishment of Cultural Revolution work groups to guide the movement.

description.zh-cn: 批准成立文化大革命工作组以指导运动。
description.en: Approved the establishment of Cultural Revolution work groups to guide the movement.

description.zh-cn: 对刘少奇和邓小平派出工作组的做法进行批评，导致工作组被撤销。
description.en: Criticized Liu Shaoqi and Deng Xiaoping for dispatching work groups, leading to their withdrawal.

description.zh-cn: 在一次大会上点名批评宋任穷，导致宋家失势。
description.en: Publicly criticized Song Renqiong at a large meeting, leading to the Song family's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 批评宋彬彬去武汉保湖北省委的行为，导致宋彬彬和其母亲被软禁于沈阳。
description.en: Criticized Song Binbin for going to Wuhan to support the Hubei Provincial Party Committee, which led to Song Binbin and her mother being placed under house arrest in Shenyang.

description.zh-cn: 作为工农兵学员就读。
description.en: Studied as a Worker-Peasant-Soldier student.

description.zh-cn: 作为卞仲耘的丈夫，王晶垚发表声明，拒绝接受宋彬彬的道歉，并称其虚伪。
description.en: As the husband of Bian Zhongyun, Wang Jingyao issued a statement rejecting Song Binbin's apology, calling it insincere.

description.zh-cn: 发表文章，首次将卞仲耘之死与宋彬彬联系起来，并指其为导致卞仲耘死亡的暴力事件的负责人。
description.en: Published articles that first linked the death of Bian Zhongyun to Song Binbin, identifying her as the person in charge of the violent event that led to Bian's death.

description.zh-cn: 在文革初期共同担任北京师大女附中革命师生代表会及文化革命筹备委员会的领导人。
description.en: Served together as leaders of the Revolutionary Teachers and Students Representative Council and the Cultural Revolution Preparatory Committee at the Beijing Normal University Affiliated Girls' Middle School in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.
